snippet: CBS announced that the reconstituted "Two and a Half Men" would be back for its 10th season in the fall with its new star, Ashton Kutcher, and the rest of the cast.
abstract: CBS announced that the reconstituted "Two and a Half Men" would be back for its 10th season in the fall with its new star, Ashton Kutcher, and the rest of the cast.

headline.main: Kutcher's Arrival Helps Revive a Comedy
